blogPost.excerpt: Blending Psychology and Artificial Intelligence with layers of insights from 10,000+ books and articles, Odo is your empathetic AI companion that chats, reads, thinks, and offers a helpful conversation to help you grow. Only available in India.
blogPost.body: Blending Psychology and Artificial Intelligence with layers of insights from 10,000+ books and articles, Odo is your empathetic AI companion that chats, reads, thinks, and offers a helpful conversation to help you grow. Only available in India.
blogPost.title: Odo - An empathetic AI companion to help you grow
blogPost.author: Bhuwan

localize.description: 将心理学和人工智能与来自10,000多本书和文章的多层洞察力融为一体，Odo是您富有同理心的AI同伴，它聊天、阅读、思考，并提供有用的对话来帮助您成长。只在印度有售。
localize.tagline: 一个富有同情心的人工智能伴侣，帮助你成长

localize.description: 將心理學和人工智能與來自10,000多本書和文章的多層洞察力融爲一體，Odo是您富有同理心的AI同伴，它聊天、閱讀、思考，並提供有用的對話來幫助您成長。只在印度有售。
localize.tagline: 一個富有同情心的人工智能伴侶，幫助你成長

previous.excerpt: Sponsorware for Github is the easiest way to sell access to your private repositories on Github with Github Sponsors. Get started in minutes and start selling your software on Github today!
previous.title: Sponsorware for Github - Sell access to Github repositories with Github Sponsors.

localize.description: Github的海绵软件是向Github赞助商出售访问你在Github上的私人存储库的最简单的方式。几分钟后开始，今天就开始在Github上销售您的软件！
localize.tagline: 向Github赞助商出售对Github存储库的访问权限。

localize.description: Github的海綿軟件是向Github贊助商出售訪問你在Github上的私人存儲庫的最簡單的方式。幾分鐘後開始，今天就開始在Github上銷售您的軟件！
localize.tagline: 向Github贊助商出售對Github存儲庫的訪問權限。

next.excerpt: Being productive is hard. Success is based on prioritized task lists and the Pomodoro Technique. Plan your week, set your daily tasks, and reflect on the past days to reach all your goals.
next.title: Success Planner - Minimalist iOS/Android app to track daily tasks

localize.description: 保持高效率是很难的。成功是基于按优先顺序排列的任务列表和波莫多罗(Pomodoro)技术。计划你的一周，设定你的每日任务，反思过去几天以达到你所有的目标。
localize.tagline: 极简主义的iOS/Android应用程序可跟踪日常任务

localize.description: 保持高效率是很難的。成功是基於按優先順序排列的任務列表和波莫多羅(Pomodoro)技術。計劃你的一週，設定你的每日任務，反思過去幾天以達到你所有的目標。
localize.tagline: 極簡主義的iOS/Android應用程序可跟蹤日常任務
